mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.plat_id AS "platInfo.id", a.name AS "name", a.description AS "description", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", suc.name as "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_cms_page_info( id, plat_id, `name`, description, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{platInfo.id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
